mapper.sql: id, item_url, nick, num_iid, category_id, pict_url, provcity, reserve_price, seller_id, small_images, title, user_type, volume, zk_final_price, taoke_url, brokerage_pro, brokerage, store_name, coupon, coupon_id, coupon_url, coupon_url_taoke, coupon_count, coupon_surplus, coupon_start, coupon_end, tag_content, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select:
select
from tb_iteminfo where brokerage > 0.5 and volume > 3000 ORDER BY coupon desc LIMIT #{startNo}, #{lengthNo}

select
from tb_iteminfo where (zk_final_price - coupon) < 20 ORDER BY id asc LIMIT #{startNo}, #{lengthNo}

select
from tb_iteminfo WHERE id >= (SELECT floor(RAND() * (SELECT MAX(id) FROM tb_iteminfo))) ORDER BY id LIMIT 20

update tb_iteminfo

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
